name: Voxel Fight
description:
Click start, to, well, start. 

Hit the "spacebar" to start the game once you see the next scene. 

  • WASD keys move you. You are the blue haired one. 
  • Left click attacks. 
  • Space bar jumps. 

This is a revised version of Chambers. 

Will be updating this project and my gamejolt account with updates. 

This version I'm testing out 

  • movement,
  •  camera, 
  • and some physics for the action. 

Let me know what you think! Come and help me build the game!
